name: courier_autodeliver
description: Toggle auto delivering of items.

name: tiny_craggy_exterior
description: Enemies that attack Tiny have a **20%** chance of being stunned for **1** second and taking **100** damage. Affects enemies within 400 range of him. Procs after an attack impacts, and does not affect spell immune enemies.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Craggy Exterior.

name: lone_druid_entangling_claws
description: Cause roots to burst from the ground, immobilizing the target enemy unit and causes them to take more damage from attacks. Enemies can still move and attack while entangled.

name: riki_permanent_invisibility
description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible. Grants bonus movement speed
lore: Riki comes for you.
note:
Riki won't auto attack enemies while invisible.
Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.

name: kunkka_torrent_storm
description: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area around Kunkka once every **0.25** for **5** seconds. Spawns within **1100** range of him.
lore: A hundred leagues of dry land couldn't keep these seas at bay.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Torrent Storm.

name: enchantress_bunny_hop
description: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 3 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 200.
lore: Sproink is as Sproink does.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Sproink.

name: rattletrap_overclocking
description: Resets Clockwerk's ability cooldowns and grants him bonus movement and attack speed for a duration. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.
lore: Rattletrap understands the limitations of his armor. Just as he understands the risks of pushing past them in times of need.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Overclocking.

name: pudge_eject
description: Ejects the swallowed allied hero inside of you.
lore: Allies emerge forever changed.

name: lycan_wolf_bite
description: Lycan bites an ally, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain **30%** Lifesteal and share %lifesteal% Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within **1200** range of each other.
lore: Does this bite look infected?
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Wolf Bite.

name: luna_lunar_grace
description: Dispels negative buffs and grants you bonus attack speed. Has an increased effect during the night.
lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.

name: treant_natures_grasp
description: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.
lore: The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.

name: drow_ranger_multishot
description: Channeling. Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to **1.75** seconds.
lore: In the ranger's youth, learning to fire multiple arrows at once was considered a distracting frivolity. In the war of the Ancients, such technique has become strange necessity.

name: special_bonus_unique_puck_5
description: Puck instantly attacks all enemies upon casting Phase Shift, within attack range + 200.

name: special_bonus_unique_snapfire_6
localized_name: Lil' Shredder Uses Your Attack Damage

name: roshan_halloween_summon
description: Roshan calls a group of Roshlings to aid him.

name: roshan_halloween_fireball
description: Roshan launches a number of slow moving fireballs at all nearby enemies.

name: juggernaut_swift_slash
description: Performs a mini Omnislash for a short duration.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Swiftslash.

name: terrorblade_terror_wave
description: Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions forcing enemy heroes to become feared upon impact, and grants Terrorblade Metamorphosis for **10** seconds.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Terror Wave.

name: special_bonus_unique_sand_king_4
description: Enemy units in range of Sand Storm have their movement speed slowed by **40%** and miss **40%** of their attacks.

name: special_bonus_unique_night_stalker_5
localized_name: +10% Hunter In The Night Movement Speed

name: keeper_of_the_light_radiant_bind
description: Weakens an enemy's magical resistance, and applies a slow that increases in strength the more the target moves.

name: tinker_shrink_ray
description: Reduces the enemy target size and lowers their max health by 20% for **6** seconds.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Shrink Ray.

name: shadow_shaman_serpentine
description: Creates a line of **8** Serpent Wards.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Serpentine.

name: brewmaster_primal_split_cancel
description: Cancel the Primal Split.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Primal Split Cancel.

name: magnataur_greater_shockwave
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Rolling Shockwave.

name: leshrac_greater_lightning_storm
description: Causes all nearby enemies in **450** AoE to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, causing them to take **30%** more magic damage and be slowed by **30%** for **4** seconds. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause you to take amplified damage.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Nihilism.

name: special_bonus_unique_lion_8
localized_name: +20 Finger of Death Damage Per Kill

name: antimage_mana_overload
description: Blinks an illusion at the target enemy or location and attack them for 7 seconds. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Blink Fragment.

name: meepo_petrify
description: Channels for 0.75 seconds and digs into the ground for 3.5 seconds, dispelling Meepo and causing him to be come invulnerable and untargetable for **4**. Restores **40%** of his max health over that duration. Can’t be cast while rooted.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Dig.

name: riki_poison_dart
description: Fires a dart at the target enemy, putting them to sleep for **4** seconds or if they take 200 damage. At the end of the duration, the target wakes up and takes **150** damage, and is slowed by **30%** for **4** seconds.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Sleeping Dart.

name: omniknight_angelic_flight
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Angelic Flight.

name: jakiro_liquid_ice
description: Stuns enemies for **0.4** seconds and applies a frost debuff that slows enemy movement speed by **20%** and take **20** plus **2.5%** of their max health per second as damage for **4** seconds.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Liquid Frost.

name: special_bonus_unique_clinkz_9
localized_name: Skeleton Walk Exit Summons A Burning Army Skeleton

name: grimstroke_ink_over
description: Covers an enemy in ink for **6** seconds, slowing their attack speed by **50**, movement speed by **25%** and dealing a total of **320** damage over its duration.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Ink Over.

name: special_bonus_unique_razor_5
localized_name: +15% Storm Surge and Unlocks Max Speed

name: dazzle_rain_of_vermin
scepter_description: Adds new ability: dazzle_rain_of_vermin.

name: centaur_overrun
description: Casts a personal Stampede.

name: windrunner_focusfire_cancel
description: End your Focus Fire early.

name: venomancer_area_poison
description: Creates a **650** AoE pool of poison at the target location, dealing another instance of Poison Nova damage and slows by 20%. If an enemy dies in the area, a Plague Ward is spawned.

name: crystal_maiden_let_it_go
description: Creates an icy path towards the targeted direction, allowing you to move faster and path freely. Enemies walking over this path will move slower.

name: beastmaster_mark_of_the_beast
scepter_description: Adds new ability: beastmaster_mark_of_the_beast.

name: kunkka_tidal_wave
description: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals **250** damage and drags enemies along it for **600** distance. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Tidal Wave.

name: special_bonus_unique_invoker_12
description: Allows Ice Wall to be cast as a Vector Target ability with **1200** cast range.

name: naga_siren_crit
description: Attacks inflict critical damage.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Critical Strike.

name: furion_greater_sprout
description: Creates a larger circle of trees in a 300 AoE for **6** seconds. Ensnares enemies inside for 2 seconds, dealing 150 damage per second.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Greater Sprout.

name: rattletrap_jetpack
description: Rises up, granting Clockwerk flying vision, flying movement, and a **20%** bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Lasts up to **6** seconds or until he casts Hookshot.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Jetpack.

name: life_stealer_ghoul_frenzy
description: Passively causes Lifestealer's attacks to significantly slow enemy movement speed for **1.5** seconds. Grants you Attack Speed.

name: witch_doctor_voodoo_switcheroo
description: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward for 2 seconds. Death Ward has -30 Attack Speed. He is hidden during this time.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Voodoo Switcheroo.

name: broodmother_silken_bola
description: Slows the target enemy, causes them to miss and deals impact damage. Units that attack the target deal bonus magic damage.
shard_description: Causes Silken Bola to be a 550 AoE spell and increases the miss chance to 80%

name: zuus_heavenly_jump
description: Jumps forward a distance of **350** units. Midway through the jump a Arc Lightning is cast on a an enemy within it’s cast range.

name: alchemist_berserk_potion
description:
Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them **50** Attack Speed and **40** HP regen.

Lasts **10** seconds.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Berserk Potion.

name: bristleback_hairball
description: Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies in a 700 radius with Goo and 2 Quills.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Hairball.

name: rubick_telekinesis_land_self
description: Chooses the location you will land when Telekinesis finishes.

name: ogre_magi_smash
description:
Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing 85% of the damage of next **3** attacks. Launches fireballs at the attacker, dealing **125** damage.

Lasts **25** seconds.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Fire Shield.

name: magnataur_horn_toss
description: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies spend **0.6** seconds in the air, then take **200** damage and are stunned for **0.75** seconds upon landing.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Horn Toss.

name: tinker_defense_matrix
description: Targets an allied unit, applying a barrier to them that blocks the next **350** damage and provides **50%** Status Resistance. Barrier lasts up to **15** seconds.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Defense Matrix.

name: shredder_flamethrower
description: Releases a **275** width flame that extends **400** range in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals **90** damage per second and slows by 30%. Affects buildings for 40% damage. Lasts **7** seconds. Debuff lingers for 3 seconds.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Flamethrower.

name: omniknight_hammer_of_purity
description: Causes Omniknight's next attack to deal bonus pure damage based on **60** plus **115%** of his base damage. He is healed for the same amount of pure damage. Cooldown: 6
shard_description: Adds new ability: Hammer of Purity.

name: dragon_knight_fireball
description: Ignites a **450** AoE area for **10** seconds, dealing **80** damage per second to enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Fireball.

name: necrolyte_death_seeker
description: Spawns a fast moving large Death Pulse towards the target enemy or ally, causing the target to become ethereal for 2.5 seconds. Reduces enemy magic resistance by 25%. Spreads towards nearby enemies and allies after impact.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Death Seeker.

name: phantom_assassin_fan_of_knives
description: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her in a 550 AoE, dealing 16% of a victim's max health on impact and applying break for 3 seconds.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Fan of Knives.

name: slark_fish_bait
description: Reduce movement speed of an enemy by **30%** for **6** seconds and provide true sight vision over them. If Slark pounces on the enemy during that time, he will be rewarded with **75** Attack Speed for the duration of the Leash.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Fish Bait.

name: special_bonus_unique_bane_7
localized_name: Brain Sap Pure and Pierces Immunity

name: storm_spirit_electric_rave
description: Grants Storm Spirit and allied heroes within 750 AoE of him 3 Overload charges. Provides 40 Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12 seconds or until the charges are depleted.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Electric Rave.

name: visage_silent_as_the_grave
description: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage 20% movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal **30%** more damage for **4** seconds. Lasts **35** seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Silent as the Grave.

name: dark_seer_normal_punch
description: Grants Normal Punch. Passive cooldown attack. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to knock an illusion out of the victim and stun them for up to 2.25 seconds, 350 distance and 250 damage based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past 3 seconds. Max power is reached after 900 distance moved. Illusions lasts for 5 seconds. Cooldown: 14
shard_description: Adds new ability: Normal Punch.

name: sniper_concussive_grenade
description: Grants Concussive Grenade. Deals 125 damage, knocking enemies back 425 distance, slowing them by 50% and disarming them for 3 seconds. Radius: 375. Knocks you back 450 units on cast.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Concussive Grenade.

name: terrorblade_demon_zeal
description: Costs **20%** of Terrorblade's Current HP to cast, providing him +**50** Movement and +**50** Attack Speed for **7** seconds. Provides **100%** more bonus while melee. Cooldown: 14.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Demon Zeal.

name: beastmaster_hawk_dive
description: Reveals itself for **1**, and then flies towards the target enemy, dealing **250** damage and stunning them for **2** second, killing the hawk.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Dive Bomb.

name: medusa_cold_blooded
description: When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy. Cooldown: 12.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Cold Blooded.

name: special_bonus_unique_queen_of_pain_5
description: Enemies damaged by Sonic Wave are forced to run away from Queen of Pain for **1.5** seconds.

name: troll_warlord_rampage
description: Global active. Grants all allied heroes **70** Attack Speed or **25%** Status Resistance for **5** seconds based on whichever stance Troll is currently in. Ranged provides attack speed and melee provides status resistance.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Rampage.

name: slark_depth_shroud
description: Creates a 300 AoE cloud at the target location for **3** seconds. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance. Cast Range: 800. Cooldown: 75. Manacost: 150
shard_description: Adds new ability: Depth Shroud.

name: special_bonus_unique_dragon_knight_8
localized_name: +375 AoE Dragon Tail During Elder Dragon Form

name: special_bonus_unique_lion_11
localized_name: +70 Max Health Per Finger of Death Kill

name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_9
localized_name: +4% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack

name: default_attack
description: Damage done by direct attacks.

name: attribute_bonus
description: Improves all attributes per point spent

name: antimage_mana_break
description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack.  Mana Break deals **50%** of the mana burned as damage to the target. Mana Break has **50%** effect if caused by illusions.
lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.

name: antimage_blink
description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.
note: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
shard_description: Increases range by 300 and reduces cooldown by 2.

name: antimage_spell_shield
description: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.
lore: Years of meditation and obsession with revenge have hardened Anti-Mage's skin against mystical opponents.
note: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

name: antimage_mana_void
description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
note: Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.

name: axe_berserkers_call
description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
scepter_description:
Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units. Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor by 7 and grants Axe 7 armor per affected target. 

Reduces Berserker's Call cooldown by 3.

name: axe_battle_hunger
description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger, half speed from creeps.
lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
note: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.

name: axe_counter_helix
description: When attacked, Axe has a chance to perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
note: Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.
shard_description: Causes Axe's attacks to have a chance to proc a Counter Helix. Attack procs ignore Counter Helix cooldown. Increases attack speed by 35 and proc chance by 10%.

name: axe_culling_blade
description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.
lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.

name: bane_brain_sap
description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
shard_description: Causes Brain Sap to become a 550 AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for 25%.

name: bane_enfeeble
description: Lowers the enemy's total attack damage, cast speed, and regeneration.
lore: Each tendril of fear that Atropos weaves increases the vulnerability of his victims to arcane and unknown arts.

name: bane_fiends_grip
description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every **0.5** seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
note: Fiend's Grip will disable and drain mana from Spell Immune units, but not damage them.
scepter_description: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by 45 seconds. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions takes 700% incoming damage and immediately dies if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.

name: bane_nightmare
description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely.
lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
note:
In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable.
Bane can wake himself from Nightmare.
On cast, replaced with Nightmare End: Ends all ongoing Nightmares on any affected units.

name: bloodseeker_bloodrage
description: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.
note: Bloodrage can be cast on yourself or an enemy units.
shard_description: Bloodrage attacks now deal 2% of the target’s max health as pure damage and heals Bloodseeker for that amount. Only works for Bloodseeker.

name: bloodseeker_blood_bath
description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After **2.9** seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.
note: Total time is a **2.6** second delay plus a **0.3** second cast time.

name: bloodseeker_thirst
description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills an enemy unit. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below **75%**, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below **25%**, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
note:
Not triggered by Illusions.
Max movement speed and attack speed bonuses occur when an enemy's health is at or below **25%**.
Effects linger for **4** seconds if a target dies.

name: bloodseeker_rupture
description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.
lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.
scepter_description: Grants Bloodseeker two charges of Rupture

name: drow_ranger_frost_arrows
description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts **1.5** seconds.
lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
note: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.
shard_description: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemy heroes, reducing their regeneration by 10% per stack. Increases damage by 5 per stack. Lasts 7 seconds. If an enemy hero dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal 60 magic damage per stack and 40% slow for 2 seconds to enemies within 650 radius. Max Stacks: 7

name: drow_ranger_silence
description: Stops all enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
note: Doesn't stop usage of items.

name: drow_ranger_trueshot
description: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.
lore: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.

name: drow_ranger_marksmanship
description: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within **400** range.
lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.
note: Marksmanship procs have true strike.
scepter_description: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.

name: earthshaker_fissure
description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
note:
Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.
Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
shard_description: Reduces Fissure cooldown by 2 seconds and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for half the duration.

name: earthshaker_enchant_totem
description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have **75** bonus attack range on the next attack.
lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
note:
Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.
Self-cast with Scepter will make it behave in the non-Scepter form, without jumping.
scepter_description: Enchant Totem becomes a **950** range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a 40% cleave hit.

name: earthshaker_aftershock
description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
note: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

name: earthshaker_echo_slam
description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.

name: juggernaut_blade_dance
description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

name: juggernaut_blade_fury
description:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. 

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
note:
You can use items during Blade Fury.
Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.
shard_description: Increases movement speed during Blade Fury by 100 and attacks a random nearby unit once per second dealing 75% damage.

name: juggernaut_healing_ward
description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at **350** movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts **25** seconds.
lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
note:
The healing ward can be controlled.
Multiple healing wards do not stack.

name: juggernaut_omni_slash
description: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.
lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
note:
You can use items during Omnislash.
Can target Spell Immune units.
Omnislash applies a basic dispel to Juggernaut on cast.

name: kunkka_torrent
description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
note:
The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies and provides vision in fog of war.
Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.

name: kunkka_tidebringer
description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
note: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.

name: kunkka_x_marks_the_spot
description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
note:
If the target becomes Spell Immune after the cast, the target will not return to the X after the duration.
Interrupts channeling spells.

name: kunkka_return
description: Returns the marked hero to the X.

name: kunkka_ghostship
description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
note:
Damage dealt after Rum wears off is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
Actual area of effect of ship's collision is larger than the boat itself.
The boat has a movement speed of **650**.

name: lina_dragon_slave
description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
note: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.

name: lina_light_strike_array
description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
note: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.

name: lina_fiery_soul
description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts **10** seconds.
lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
note:
Duration refreshes each time a new spell is cast.
Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.

name: lina_laguna_blade
description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.
lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
note: Laguna Blade has a **0.25** delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
scepter_description: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.
shard_description: Increases Laguna Blade's cast range by 250 and causes it to go the full cast length and hit all units along the way. Can be ground targeted.

name: lion_impale
description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
note: The spikes move at **1600** units per second.

name: lion_voodoo
description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
note:
Instantly destroys illusions.
The target will have a base movement speed of **120**, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.

name: lion_mana_drain
description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
note: Instantly destroys illusions.
shard_description: Causes Mana Drain to affect up to three enemies. You become Spell Immune while channeling.

name: lion_finger_of_death
description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
note:
Finger of Death has a **0.25** delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
Finger of Death only gains damage if the enemy hero dies within **3** seconds of being affected by Finger of Death.
scepter_description: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

name: mirana_arrow
description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from **0.01** to **3.5**/**4**/**4.5**/**5** seconds, with bonus damage up to **180** added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
note:
For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.
Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.
scepter_description: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies within 500 AoE along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second starfall that deals 50% damage to the impacted unit.

name: mirana_invis
description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
note:
Units affected will not auto attack enemies.
Spell Immune allies will be affected.

name: mirana_leap
description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts **2.5** seconds.
lore: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
shard_description: Grants +1 Leap Charge. Leap buff grants Mirana 1.5x Critical Strike attacks for its duration.

name: mirana_starfall
description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a **425** radius will be struck a second time for **75%** of the damage.
lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
note:
Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Starstorm cannot hit invisible units.
Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

name: morphling_waveform
description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

name: morphling_adaptive_strike_agi
description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a **3** second cooldown.
lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
note: Projectile moves at **1150** speed.
shard_description: Causes Adaptive Strike to have +1 Multishot and increases the stun duration by 1 second. Multishot prioritizes heroes.

name: morphling_morph_agi
description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
note:
Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Agility Gain will also level up Strength Gain.

name: morphling_morph_str
description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.
lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
note:
Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Strength Gain will also level up Agility Gain.

name: morphling_replicate
description: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities with reduced mana cost. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
note: You can't target yourself with Morph.
scepter_description: Allows targeting allied heroes. While Morphed, Morphling gains Cast Range increase.

name: morphling_morph_replicate
description: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.

name: nevermore_shadowraze1
description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadow Raze damage per stack.
lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
note: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

name: nevermore_shadowraze2
description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadow Raze damage per stack.
lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
note: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

name: nevermore_shadowraze3
description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadow Raze damage per stack.
lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
note: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

name: nevermore_necromastery
description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 40% of them from bondage.
lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
note: Denies and neutral creeps also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.

name: nevermore_dark_lord
description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
note: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.
shard_description: Lowers nearby enemy magic resistance by 14%.

name: nevermore_requiem
description:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed reduced for **0.8** seconds for each line hit. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery. 

 Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
note:
One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every **1** souls in his possession, for a maximum of 18 lines (23 lines with Scepter).
The movement reductions from Requiem of Souls go through spell immunity.
Fear and movement slow do not apply when if the Requiem was released on death.
scepter_description: Increases Necromastery Max Souls and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.

name: phantom_lancer_spirit_lance
description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
note: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.
shard_description: Spirit Lance bounces once on an enemy within 900 radius, prioritizing heroes. Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage by +50% and cast range by 200.

name: phantom_lancer_doppelwalk
description:
Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After **1** second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes **500%** bonus damage and deals **-80%** less damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.
note:
This ability can be used to dodge projectiles, and dispell debuffs.
Trees near a reappearing unit will be destroyed.
Phantom Lancer and his allies can see which illusion is the 100% damage illusion.

name: phantom_lancer_juxtapose
description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for **8** seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last **4** seconds.
lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...
note: Illusions created by Juxtapose will attack the target that the ability was triggered upon.
scepter_description: Adds Juxtapose active ability. Destroys Phantom Lancer's other juxtapose illusions and quickly creates the max illusions it allows with a bonus 10 seconds of duration.

name: phantom_lancer_phantom_edge
description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
lore: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.
note:
If the attack order is cancelled, the movement speed bonus is lost.
Rush movement speed is **800**.

name: puck_illusory_orb
description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
note:
The Illusory Orb grants unobstructed vision around its location while it travels.
Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

name: puck_ethereal_jaunt
description: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.

name: puck_waning_rift
description: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
shard_description: Waning Rift now deals 70 bonus damage and knocks enemies back 250 distance over 0.4 seconds (non-interrupting). Reveals invisible enemy units and wards in the area for 5 seconds.

name: puck_phase_shift
description: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
note:
Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift.
Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift.
Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.

name: puck_dream_coil
description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for **0.5** seconds, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.
lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
scepter_description: Increases damage from coil breaks, increases coil duration, coil break stun goes through spell immunity.

name: pudge_flesh_heap
description: Gives Pudge increased magic resistance, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'

name: pudge_meat_hook
description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.
lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
note:
Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy.
Meat Hook hits invisible units.
Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, ancient units and Roshan.
Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.
Meat Hook can hit and drag runes to Pudge, refunding the Hook's mana cost.

name: pudge_rot
description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
note:
Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling.
Rot hits invisible units.
If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated.
scepter_description:
Increases Rot radius by **225** and damage by **100**.

Reduces health regen on affected enemies by 25%.

name: pudge_dismember
description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts longer on creeps.
lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
note: If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.
shard_description: Allows targeting an ally to swallow them and heal them for **6%** of their max health per second. Reduces cooldown by 10 seconds.

name: shadow_shaman_ether_shock
description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
note: Can hit secondary targets up to 1000 distance away.

name: shadow_shaman_voodoo
description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
note:
Instantly destroys illusions.
The target will have a base movement speed of **100**, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
Hex disables damage block.

name: shadow_shaman_shackles
description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.
lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
shard_description: Shackles creates 4 Serpent Wards attacking the target. Increases Shackles cast range by 125. Lasts 7 seconds.

name: shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward
description: Summons **10** Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.
lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.
scepter_description: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage. Increases attack range of Serpent Wards.

name: razor_plasma_field
description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
lore: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.

name: razor_static_link
description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows razor to attack while moving with the link active.
lore: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.
note:
The link is broken when either unit dies or the distance between them becomes **250** units greater than Static Link's cast range.
Can target Spell Immune units.

name: razor_unstable_current
description: Passively increases Razor's movement speed.
lore: Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.
shard_description: Causes Storm Surge to have an 18% chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release forked lightning that strikes the target and up to 2 other enemies. Deals 150 Damage and slows them by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

name: razor_eye_of_the_storm
description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.
lore: Ride the lightning.
note:
Each blast targets the lowest health enemy unit within range.
Eye of the Storm will prioritize striking static linked heroes.
Successive casts of Eye of the Storm will stack.
scepter_description: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

name: skeleton_king_hellfire_blast
description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.
note: If Wraith King has summoned skeletons, casting Wraithfire Blast on a target will order all of the skeletons to attack that target.

name: skeleton_king_vampiric_aura
description: Restore health based on the damage Wraith King deals when attacking enemy units. Can be cast to summon skeletons with Vampiric Spirit. Every two kills on an enemy unit adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed.
lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.
note: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.

name: skeleton_king_mortal_strike
description: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.
lore: One blow to crush a foe.
note: Summoned skeletons will automatically attack any unit targeted by Wraithfire Blast.

name: skeleton_king_reincarnation
description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a **900** radius will be slowed.
lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
note:
Wraith King won't revive if he doesn't have enough mana.
If Wraith King has an Aegis and Reincarnation off cooldown, Reincarnation will trigger first.
Revives with full HP and Mana.
Credit for allies whose death was delayed will go to whoever struck the original killing blow.
Wraith Delay affects Wraith King's actual deaths, not Reincarnate deaths.
scepter_description: If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed for **7** seconds. Buffs the transformed units with +70 attack speed and +25% movement speed.
shard_description: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost and spawn three skeletons to attack each nearby enemy hero when Reincarnation is triggered.

name: death_prophet_carrion_swarm
description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
note: Can hit units up to 1110 range away.

name: death_prophet_silence
description: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
note: Doesn't prevent usage of items.

name: death_prophet_exorcism
description: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Lasts **35** seconds.
lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.
note:
Radius represents the area in which the spirits will acquire targets around Death Prophet.
Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.
scepter_description: Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out, slow and hit the enemy for bonus its usual damage then return to her with life.

name: sven_storm_bolt
description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
scepter_description: Increases cast range and transports Sven along the storm hammer.
shard_description: Storm Hammer now applies a dispel on enemies and reduces cooldown by 4 seconds.

name: sven_great_cleave
description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.
note:
Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.

name: sven_warcry
description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts **8** seconds.
lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!

name: sven_gods_strength
description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for **40** seconds.
lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
note: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.

name: storm_spirit_static_remnant
description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts **12** seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
note:
Remnants take **1** second to materialize after the spell is cast.
Remnants grant unobstructed vision for their duration.
The explosion actually hits units in a **260** radius, but will only be triggered in **235**.

name: storm_spirit_electric_vortex
description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
scepter_description: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

name: storm_spirit_overload
description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
lore: Pow!  Zip!  Zap!
note:
Using items doesn't trigger Overload.
Overload charges do not stack.
shard_description: Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and allied heroes within 750 AoE of him 3 Overload charges. Provides 40 Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12 seconds or until the charges are depleted.

name: storm_spirit_ball_lightning
description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is **30**+**8%** of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is **10**+**0.65%** of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
lore: The Storm is coming in.
note:
Abilities and items can be used while traveling.
This ability will destroy trees.
Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.

name: sandking_burrowstrike
description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.
lore: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.
scepter_description: Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit by Sand King's Burrowstrike and increases its cast range. Does not apply Caustic Finale to illusions.

name: sandking_sand_storm
description: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.
lore: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.
note:
Sand Storm can be used to dodge projectiles.
Sand King briefly becomes visible upon attacking or using spells while in Sand Storm. Sand King will become invisible again in **0.7** seconds.

name: sandking_caustic_finale
description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to move more slowly and to violently explode when it dies.
lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

name: sandking_epicenter
description: CHANNELED - After channeling for  seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
lore: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.
note:
The pulses are centered on Sand King, not where he first casted the spell.
The pulses have gradually inreasing radius, ranging from 500 to 725.
shard_description: Every 700 units moved causes an Epicenter Pulse around Sand King in 475 AoE.

name: tiny_avalanche
description: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 2.5x damage to units being tossed.
lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.

name: tiny_toss
description: Grabs the nearest unit in a **275** radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.  If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra **30%** damage.
lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.
note:
You can toss allies, but they don't take damage.
Toss deals 33% of its damage to buildings.

name: tiny_tree_grab
description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
lore: Sticks and stones break all the bones, with structures sure to follow.
note: The cooldown begins when the tree is thrown.
shard_description: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.

name: tiny_grow
description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, while slowing his attack speed.
lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.

name: zuus_arc_lightning
description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

name: zuus_lightning_bolt
description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a **750** radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in **325** range.
lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
note: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.

name: zuus_static_field
description: Zeus shocks any enemy hit by his abilities, causing damage proportional to their current health.
lore: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.
note:
The damage from Static Field is dealt before the damage from the used spell.
Using items doesn't trigger Static Field.
shard_description: Static Field can be cast to perform a Heavenly Jump, shocking the closest visible enemy (prioritizing heroes) within 2000 range, dealing Static Field damage to them and reducing their movement speed by 100% for 2.5 seconds. If Zeus was moving forward, he will jump towards that direction. Cooldown: 11. Manacost: 100.

name: zuus_thundergods_wrath
description: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.

name: slardar_sprint
description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar gains movement speed bonus while in the river.
lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.
note: Activating this skill doesn't interrupt channeling abilities.
scepter_description: Provides additional HP Regen, Armor and Status Resistance while in a puddle or in the river.

name: slardar_slithereen_crush
description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
lore: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.
scepter_description: Whenever Slardar casts Slithereen Crush, he creates a puddle of water that is considered a river for movement and bonuses.
shard_description: Causes Slithereen Crush to apply Corrosive Haze for 5 seconds to units affected. Increases radius by 75.

name: slardar_bash
description: After **3** attacks, your next attack will bash the target. Deals double damage against creeps.
lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.
note: Does not stack with Skull Basher.

name: slardar_amplify_damage
description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.
lore: Even the strongest armor counts for little when left to the brine of the sea.

name: tidehunter_gush
description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
lore: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.
scepter_description: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.

name: tidehunter_kraken_shell
description:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.
note:
Only damage from player owned sources is counted towards debuff removal.
The counter will reset if no player owned damage is taken for **6** seconds.
Kraken Shell removes most debuffs, even if they are generally not purgable.

name: tidehunter_anchor_smash
description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
lore: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.
note: Anchor Smash works on all Ancient creeps except for Roshan.
shard_description: Increases Anchor Smash damage by 90 and causes it to affect buildings. Reduces cooldown by 1 second.

name: tidehunter_ravage
description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
lore: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.
note:
Ravage will hit invisible units.
Ravage waves move outwards at a speed of **725**.

name: vengefulspirit_magic_missile
description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
lore: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.

name: vengefulspirit_command_aura
description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.
lore: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.
note:
Vengeance Illusion keeps providing the Vengeance Aura after Vengeful Spirit's death.
Strong Illusions are not instantly killed by spells.
scepter_description: Upon death, creates a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit that deals and takes 100% damage and can cast all of her spells. Illusion has 25% movement speed bonus. If the illusion is alive when Vengeful Spirit respawn, she will take its place. XP earned by her illusion is given to her.

name: vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror
description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.
lore: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.
shard_description: Wave of Terror steals 20% of enemy hero base damage and base armor, granting it to Vengeful Spirit for the debuff duration.

name: vengefulspirit_nether_swap
description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.
lore: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.
note:
Works on Spell Immune units.
Trees near Vengeful Spirit and the target will be destroyed when the spell is cast.
Channeling spells are interrupted by Nether Swap.

name: crystal_maiden_crystal_nova
description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.

name: crystal_maiden_frostbite
description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts **10** seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
note: Frostbite is considered a root.

name: crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura
description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.
lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.

name: crystal_maiden_freezing_field
description: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts **10** seconds.
lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
note:
The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts **1** second).
Explosions occur every **0.1** seconds.
scepter_description: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over a set amount of time.
shard_description: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 75% slower during this.

name: windrunner_shackleshot
description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to **0.75**.
lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.
note:
This spell can shackle two enemies together, stunning them both.
Can shackle the target to an enemy unit or tree at most **575** behind the target.
Shackleshot can be disjointed.

name: windrunner_powershot
description: Windranger charges her bow for up to **1** second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by **20%**.
lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
note: Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.
shard_description: Powershot now becomes global, but only hits heroes beyond its default range (max 1 hero). Impacted heroes will be killed if they are under 13% after taking the impact damage. Lowers cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

name: windrunner_windrun
description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
note: Activating Windrun will evade incoming projectiles.
scepter_description: Grants **2** charges to Windrun and grants haste movement speed. Passively provides 30% Evasion.

name: windrunner_focusfire
description: Windranger channels the wind to gain **475** additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.
note:
Issuing a Hold Position command will pause Windranger's attacks.
Windranger can move while attacking.

name: lich_frost_nova
description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for **4** seconds.  The primary target receives both base and area damage.
lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.

name: lich_frost_armor
description: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts **40** seconds.
lore: Originally crafted during his ambush for self-defense, the Lich is capable of enchanting others with a formidable defense of frost magic.
note: If autocast is activated, Lich will cast this spell on nearby allies who are attacked.

name: lich_frost_shield
description: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against you. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every **1** seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.
lore: First conceived of to protect him in his mortal years, the frost magic that Ethreain weaves around himself has only grown colder with time.
note:
Spell-immune enemies are not affected by the damage or slow.
Frost Shield can be cast on buildings.

name: lich_chain_frost
description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to **10** times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.
lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.
note:
Chain Frost cannot be disjointed.
Chain Frost has a movement speed of **850**.
Chain Frost doesn't bounce to Zombies.

name: witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask
description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.
lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
note: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.

name: witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration
description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo restoration is active.
lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.
note:
Healing is done in **0.33** second intervals.
Can heal Spell Immune units.

name: witch_doctor_maledict
description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
note: If an affected hero's health has increased above the amount they had when Maledict was cast, the burst damage will be 0.

name: witch_doctor_death_ward
description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within it's attack range. Lasts a maximum of **8** seconds.
lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
note:
The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires.
The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.
Death Ward attacks once every 0.22 seconds.
scepter_description: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.

name: riki_smoke_screen
description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss attacks.
lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
note:
Can be cast during Tricks of the Trade.
Doesn't prevent the use of active items.

name: riki_blink_strike
description: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.
note:
Riki's first attack after Blink Strike will be a backstab.
Blink Strike's damage is dealt before the next attack.
You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.

name: riki_backstab
description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.
lore: Riki comes for you.
note:
Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.

name: riki_tricks_of_the_trade
description: Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him.
lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
note: Moving while phased out will cancel the ability.
scepter_description: Increases cast range and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.

name: enigma_malefice
description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every **2** seconds.
lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.

name: enigma_demonic_conversion
description: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.
note:
Converted enemy units will give gold bounty and experience.
Converted allied units will be denied.

name: enigma_midnight_pulse
description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.
lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.
note:
Damage goes through spell immunity.
This ability destroys trees in its area.
Multiple instances of Midnight Pulse will stack.

name: enigma_black_hole
description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.
lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.
note: Disables enemies through spell immunity.
scepter_description: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.
shard_description: Black Hole does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a 1200 AoE. Pulls at a rate of 175.

name: tinker_laser
description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks.
lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.
scepter_description: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, granting +400 cast range and reducing the enemy hero's size and current health by 15% (stacking). The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to 700 range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.

name: tinker_heat_seeking_missile
description: Launches rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within **2500** range.
lore: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.

name: tinker_march_of_the_machines
description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
lore: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.
note: Robots spawn at a rate of **24** per second.

name: tinker_rearm
description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.
lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
note: Rearm works on all items except Aeon Disk, Arcane Boots, Black King Bar, Hand of Midas, Helm of the Dominator, Linken's Sphere, Meteor Hammer, Necronomicon, Pipe of Insight, Tome of Knowledge, and Refresher Orb.

name: sniper_shrapnel
description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every **35** seconds.
lore: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.
note:
Damage is dealt 11 times, immediately at spell effect then every second.
Does not damage buildings.
Provides vision in the targeted area.

name: sniper_headshot
description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly knocks back his enemies.
lore: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.
note: Works on allied creeps.

name: sniper_take_aim
description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle. Can be activated to provided True Strike and +30% Headshot chance for 4 seconds. Slows you by 30% for the duration.
lore: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.

name: sniper_assassinate
description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.
