lore: Like a hall of mirrors might amplify the light of a single candle, the shattered walls of the universe can transform the light of prophecy into a burning torch.
note: The healing from Purifying Flames can be stacked with itself.

name: oracle_false_promise
description:
Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is doubled. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: Foes and false prophets oft make lies of men's fates.
note:
Delayed damage and healing will take armor and magic resistance reductions into account when received.
The delayed damage and healing takes effect as soon as the target becomes vulnerable.
shard_description: Causes False Promise to have a 0.15-second fade delay invisibility.

name: tusk_launch_snowball
description: Launch the snowball toward the target.
lore: Into the great wide white!
note:
The snowball destroys trees.
Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.

name: broodmother_spin_web_destroy
description: Destroys the selected Spin Web.

name: techies_minefield_sign
description: Plant a warning sign to remind enemies to step lightly. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts **180** seconds.
lore: Watch your step!
scepter_description: Allows Minefield Sign to hide any Proximity Mines, Stasis Traps, and Remote Mines in an area around the sign from True Sight.

name: shredder_chakram_2
description: Fires a secondary saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Additionally, for each 5% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and Timbersaw loses the ability to attack.
lore: Cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut!
note:
The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over **2000** distance away.
Slow effects from two chakrams do not stack.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Second Chakram.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_SHOW_IN_GUIDES

name: shredder_return_chakram_2
description: Returns the Chakram to Timbersaw.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING

name: earth_spirit_petrify
description:
Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies. 

Can be cast on Earth Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.
lore: Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Enchant Remnant.

name: treant_eyes_in_the_forest
description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.
lore: One can never be too certain who, or what, might need protecting.
note:
Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes of the Forest does damage.
If the enemy has True Sight, they will be able to see which trees are enchanted.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Eyes In The Forest.

name: winter_wyvern_arctic_burn
description: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of **6%**/**7%**/**8%**/**9%** of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her **400** additional vision range at night while soaring.
lore: The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.
note:
Enemy units can only receive the Arctic Burn debuff once per cast.
This ability does not affect Roshan.
Reduces Winter Wyvern's attack point to **0.1**.
The damage and slow from Arctic Burn can be dispelled.
scepter_description: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases Winter Wyvern's movement speed.

name: winter_wyvern_splinter_blast
description: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a **500** radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by **30%**.
lore: Produced slowly by specialized vesicles in her frozen gullet, Winter Wyvern blast shards of ice at her enemies.
note:
The primary projectile moves at **650** movement speed, or reaches the target in **1** second, whichever is faster.
The primary projectile cannot be disjointed.

name: winter_wyvern_cold_embrace
description: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.
lore: From winter's heart comes a cold, healing embrace. The ice slows the blood and allows the spell to better work its curative magic.
shard_description: When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off at that location, hitting enemies within 1200 range. Reduces cooldown by 5 seconds.

name: winter_wyvern_winters_curse
description: Winter Wyvern freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies with the exception of Winter Wyvern or her controlled units.
lore: The oldest of the bookwurm’s spells, this curse lends truth to the old saw: sometimes the enemy of my enemy is my enemy still.
note:
If the target dies to its allies, Winter Wyvern will receive credit for the kill.
Will only pierce the spell immunity of the primary target, not the target's surrounding allies.

name: life_stealer_control
description: Lifestealer seizes control of the host body's nervous system, allowing him to issue movement and attack orders from within.  Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed.  Cannot be used on heroes.

name: granite_golem_hp_aura
description: Increases the health capacity of nearby units.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNRESTRICTED

name: nyx_assassin_burrow
description: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. His health and mana regeneration are also increased, and he gains damage reduction from all damage sources.
lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.
note: Casting Vendetta will cancel burrow.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Burrow.

name: mud_golem_rock_destroy
description: On death, Mud Golems shatter into 2 Shard Golems. Shard Golems have **240** health, deal **9** damage per attack, and live for **60** seconds.

name: tusk_ice_shards_stop
description: Stop.

name: mud_golem_hurl_boulder
description: Hurls a boulder at the target, damaging and stunning them. Golems do not do this unless commanded to.
lore: "Why do they hesitate? What are they afraid of throwing?"

name: life_stealer_assimilate
description:
Lifestealer swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the hero within. When an assimilated hero leaves Lifestealer, they erupt outward, damaging nearby enemies.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: How can Lifestealer resist the chance to sample an ally?
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Assimilate.

name: tusk_walrus_kick
description: Kicks the closest enemy unit in a targeted direction, stunning and damaging them.
lore: Tusk may have made his name with his fists, but the wise enemy is wary of any and all limbs.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Walrus Kick.

name: nyx_assassin_unburrow
description: Emerge from the burrow.
lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.

name: morphling_hybrid
description: Morphling creates a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, which can cast all of that hero's current, non-ultimate abilities. Enemies are able to see which unit is a hybrid.

name: life_stealer_assimilate_eject
description: Ejects an Assimilated hero, damaging nearby enemies.

name: arc_warden_flux
description: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, slowing its movement speed and dealing damage over time. The effect is muted if another enemy unit is near the target.
lore: An infinitesimal fraction of the power which imprisoned the Ancients.

name: arc_warden_magnetic_field
description: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.
lore: Time and space are of little consequence to one as old as Zet.
shard_description: Magnetic Field now pushes enemies out of the area at cast time, and provides allies in it with +40% Magic Resistance. Slows enemies inside by 20%.

name: arc_warden_spark_wraith
description: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.
lore: Lesser fragments of Zet's original self.
note: Spark Wraiths can not be disjointed.
scepter_description: Causes Spark Wraiths to spawn a new Spark Wraith after impacting an enemy, which then starts its 3 second activation period.

name: black_dragon_dragonhide_aura
description: The Ancient Black Dragon's dreaded presence grants nearby allies additional armor. This bonus can stack with itself.

name: big_thunder_lizard_wardrums_aura
description: The rhythm of the Thunderhide's heartbeat increases the attack speed and accuracy of nearby allies.

name: arc_warden_tempest_double
description: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and spells, except most consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has separate item and ability cooldowns.  The Tempest Double gives bounty gold to enemies when killed.
lore: Warped by the power of its peers, Arc Warden becomes what it despises most: disharmony.
note: Tempest Double and Refresher Orb cannot be used by the duplicate.

name: obsidian_destroyer_equilibrium
description: Passively grants you a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.
lore: The Outworld is awash in arcane energy, inclined to diffuse through any of Harbinger's rifts.
shard_description: Essence Flux becomes castable ability with 0.75 cast time. Swaps Outworld Destroyer's current Life and Mana totals. Cooldown: 45

name: death_prophet_spirit_siphon
description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining **14** + **1%**/**2.5%**/**4%**/**5.5%** Max HP per second from the enemy.
lore: Krobelus willingly shows others the path she alone cannot follow.
note: Cannot cast multiple on same target.
shard_description: Increases Spirit Siphon charges by 1 and causes enemies to be feared for 2 seconds if they are siphoned for 4 seconds consecutively.

name: lone_druid_savage_roar_bear
description: Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by **20%**.
note:
An entangled hero will not be able to move.
Cooldown is shared with Lone Druid.

name: mudgolem_cloak_aura
description: This creature protects its allies with a Magic resistance aura. Creeps are better protected.

name: black_dragon_fireball
description: Hurls a fire blast on the ground, igniting the area in a **300** radius for **10** seconds. Enemies caught in the fire will take **85** damage per second.

name: invoker_attribute_bonus
description: Improves all attributes per point spent

name: faceless_void_time_dilation
description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for **8**/**9**/**10**/**11** seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by **10%** for each cooldown extended. Deals damage per second for each cooldown.
lore: For those facing off against Darkterror, each moment seems to stretch into eternity.
note: Does not affect item cooldowns.

name: monkey_king_boundless_strike
description: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.
lore: The legendary Jingu Bang grows to match its master's will, ensuring no enemy can escape the Monkey King's reach.
note: Does not affect spell-immune enemies.

name: monkey_king_mischief
description: Changes Monkey King's shape to deceive opponents, using the environment nearby as inspiration for the disguise. Taking damage, attacking, or using any item or ability breaks Monkey King's disguise. Grants damage immunity for **0.2** upon transforming.
lore: Watch out for that tree.
note: If transformed into a courier, Monkey King matches the movement speed of the courier.

name: monkey_king_tree_dance
description: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage from player controlled units or Roshan while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.
lore: Sun Wukong dances nimbly along the treetop canopy, always just out of arm's reach.
note:
Tree Dance cooldown starts upon landing.
Right-clicking the ground will have Monkey King drop from the tree.
shard_description: Reduces cooldown to 0.4 and cast point to 0.1.

name: monkey_king_untransform
description: Reverts Monkey King's shape to his original form.

name: monkey_king_jingu_mastery
description: Monkey King's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, Monkey King earns four charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.
lore: Always sensitive to the moods of its master, the Jingu Bang radiates power when Sun Wukong's combat fervor is on full display.
note:
Hitting an enemy with Boundless Strike adds to the hit counter.
Repeatedly hitting an enemy refreshes the Jingu Mastery debuff duration.
Hit charges on enemies cannot be dispelled.

name: monkey_king_primal_spring
description: Monkey King springs out from his tree perch, damaging and slowing enemies in the area where he lands. Damage and slow amounts are in proportion to channel duration.
lore: Leaping from the safety of cover into the midst of his enemies, Sun Wukong attacks without mercy.

name: monkey_king_wukongs_command
description: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King is granted bonus armor for the spell's duration.
lore: Monkey King rips out a tuft of fur to blow at his enemies, charging each strand to transform into a copy of himself.
note:
Soldiers do not receive Jingu Mastery bonuses.
Soldiers do not copy Basher or Abyssal.
scepter_description: Spawns a monkey soldier near Monkey King at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby.

name: elder_titan_natural_order_spirit
description: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
lore: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.
note: When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.

name: special_bonus_unique_warlock_1
localized_name: 80% Magic Resistance for Chaotic Offering Golems

name: special_bonus_unique_invoker_2
description: Releases 12 Deafening Blasts around Invoker in a circular pattern.  An enemy can only be hit once per cast.

name: spawnlord_aura
description: Gives lifesteal and health regeneration to nearby allies.
note: The aura is stacking.

name: special_bonus_unique_lion
description: Automatically targets additional enemy units with a mana pool within 400 distance around the original target.

name: special_bonus_unique_medusa
description: The duration of the stun is not affected.

name: special_bonus_unique_phantom_assassin
description: Launches a two extra Stifling Daggers towards random visible enemies within the cast range.

name: filler_ability
description: Generates an aura that provides increased health and mana regeneration to nearby allies when activated.
note:
Right click the Shrine to activate.
Regeneration values increase by +2/1 health/mana per minute.
Additionally restores 2% health/mana pool per second.

name: special_bonus_unique_mirana_2
description: The extra arrows are launched in a cone shape, 30 degrees to the left and right of the original arrow, and cannot hit the same target.

name: special_bonus_unique_chen_1
localized_name: +3 Holy Persuasion Max Units and Charges

name: spawnlord_master_stomp
description: Stomps the ground, dealing damage to nearby units and reducing their base physical armor by **50%**.

name: spawnlord_master_freeze
description: Causes the next attack to petrify the enemy, rooting them and dealing **75** damage per second.

name: special_bonus_unique_lich_2
localized_name: Attacks Apply 60% MS and AS Slow

name: special_bonus_unique_centaur_1
description: Allied heroes within 1200 range of Centaur gain the Return Damage aspect of Retaliate.

name: zuus_cloud
description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
lore: Where the thunder god's ire grows, storm clouds quickly gather.
note:
Grants **100** gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
Affects the closest enemy unit with strikes from Zeus's current level of Lightning Bolt.
Towers and creeps do half damage to the Nimbus.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Nimbus.

name: dark_willow_bramble_maze
description: Dark Willow creates a maze of brambles that grow in the target area after **0.5** seconds.  Enemies that walk into a bramble are rooted and take damage over time.
lore: The fae realm exists all around you, merely waiting to draw you in...
note:
Does not reveal rooted invisible enemies.
Does not interrupt channeling spells upon rooting.

name: dark_willow_bedlam
description: Dark Willow's pet wisp roams around her for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies.  Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.
lore: You'll have to excuse my friend Jex. He's really into murder.

name: dark_willow_shadow_realm
description: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable.  Her next attack has increased attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. Damage scales based on how long she remains under the effects of Shadow Realm, the maximum being reached after **3.5** seconds.
lore: What you can't see will most definitely hurt you.
note:
Disjoints projectiles upon cast.
Grants phased movement.
Spells which require vision cannot affect Dark Willow in the Shadow Realm.
scepter_description: Attacking no longer takes Dark Willow out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.

name: dark_willow_cursed_crown
description: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.
lore: Didn't anyone ever tell you? Never strike a deal with a fairy...
shard_description: Cursed Crown creates four brambles around the target after the counter ends. Triggers even upon dispel. Reduces cooldown by 3 seconds and stun delay by 1 second.

name: pangolier_gyroshell
description:
Pangolier curls into a spell-immune ball and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage and stunning them when they land. 

Colliding with walls or cliffs will cause a temporary pause while Pangolier reverses in direction.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: Where his ancestors sought only refuge, the Pangolier saw opportunity...
note:
Enemies can be stunned multiple times per use, but cannot be affected a subsequent time until the previous stun duration ends.
If Pangolier is disabled while rolling, he will continue to stun and knock enemies that come within range.

name: pangolier_swashbuckle
description:
Vector Targeted. Pangolier dashes along the target line, then slashes all enemies in the drawn direction with several quick swipes.

Lucky Shot has a chance to activate from this damage.
lore: The Pangolier's blade is even nimbler than his tongue.
note:
Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on Swashbuckle attacks.
Casting Swashbuckle during Rolling Thunder ends Rolling Thunder.

name: pangolier_heartpiercer
description: Pangolier reads his enemies perfectly, deftly slipping his blade past defenses. Each attack has a chance to negate enemy armor and slow the target for a duration, activating after a short delay.
lore: These fools know nothing of real armor...
note: Does not proc when attacking Roshan or buildings.

name: special_bonus_unique_razor_2
localized_name: -0.1 Eye of the Storm Strike Interval

name: pangolier_gyroshell_stop
description: Halt!
lore: Donté Panlin stops when he pleases.

name: pangolier_shield_crash
description:
Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground in front of his current position, damaging all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains a percentage of incoming damage reduction for a short time.

Forward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.
lore: Only in the midst of his enemies does the Pangolier truly thrive.
scepter_description: Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle in every 90 degrees around your hero.

name: void_spirit_dissimilate
description: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.
lore: Inai much prefers to observe our plane free from the confines of corporeal form.
shard_description: Adds a partial outer ring to Dissimilate. Increases damage by **200**.

name: snapfire_scatterblast
description: Snapfire unloads with a wide blast that damages and slows enemies in a cone. Enemies caught at point-blank range take an extra **50%** damage.
lore: A favorite from her collection, Beadie crafted Ol' Rackatee as her first line of defense when she ventured into the Outlands.
shard_description: Causes Scatterblast to knock units back in the point blank range for 250 units, dealing 125 extra damage and stunning for 2 seconds.

name: snapfire_mortimer_kisses
description: Snapfire's friend launches a barrage of firespit globs over **6** seconds. Globs cause impact damage and create pools of firespit, which slow and apply damage over time. Snapfire has a reduced turn rate for the duration and a minimum launch range of **600**. Each glob can be targeted with a right click.
lore: Little did Beadie know when she adopted Mortimer, dragon toads--which aren't even toads at all--share more than just a name with their distant draconic cousins.
note:
Can be cancelled by pressing Stop, Hold Position, or using another ability.
Has a minimum travel time of **0.8** and maximum travel time of **2**.

name: snapfire_firesnap_cookie
description: Snapfire feeds a potent cookie to Mortimer or an ally, causing them to hop a short distance. The hopping unit stuns and damages enemies in the landing zone.
lore: With the help of a secret mixture that pairs Beadie's baking skills with her passion for black powder, these battle biscuits pack a punch.
note: The cookie projectile has a speed of **1000**.

name: snapfire_gobble_up
description: Mortimer gobbles up a creep or an allied hero, which he can then spit towards enemies. The unit stays in his belly up to **3** seconds.
note: Snapfire earns the creep's bounty after it has been spat out and died.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Gobble Up.

name: snapfire_spit_creep
description: Mortimer spits out the unit that's in his mouth, causing impact damage and stun in a large area. The glob leaves a pool of firespit that slows and applies damage over time.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Spit Out.

name: snapfire_lil_shredder
description: Snapfire heats up her mounted turret to rapidly fire **6** fixed-damage attacks. Each attack reduces the enemy's armor. Provides bonus attack range for the duration.
lore: Beadie constantly tinkers with a design she first dreamed up plotting an exodus from her old gang.
note:
Sets **1** base attack rate for the duration.
Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on Lil' Shredder attacks.

name: grimstroke_soul_chain
description: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero receives also gets cast on the other hero. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.
lore: The Ascended were chosen sons of Ashkavor, granted immense power by the bonds forged between their own souls and those they were charged with protecting. In the years that followed the ruination of his kin, Grimstroke discovered much more sinister applications for the binding rituals...
note:
Affected units are leashed, and prevented from blinking.
Provides vision of both leashed units.

name: mars_gods_rebuke
description: Mars smashes enemies in front of him with his shield, knocking them back and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Bonus damage is added when hitting heroes. Has True Strike.
lore: There isn't a warrior alive who can stand unmoved by the sting of Mars' rebuke.
note: Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on God's Rebuke attacks.

name: special_bonus_unique_visage_3
description: A second Soul Assumption is launched towards a random enemy unit within the cast range, prioritizing Heroes.

name: special_bonus_unique_wraith_king_4
description: Instead of being slowed, all enemy units within 900 range have the current level of Wraithfire Blast cast on them when Reincarnation triggers.

name: mars_bulwark
description:
Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides.

 Can be toggled, removing Mars's ability to attack, and locking the direction he is facing. When active, reduces movement speed and re-directs **70%** of the attack projectiles aimed at Mars's allies towards Mars instead.
lore: Only the very foolish dare to fight fair with the god of war.
scepter_description: Creates invulnerable soldiers around Mars' front while Bulwark is toggled on. Soldiers move alongside Mars, dealing his full damage +75 and applying procs. Attacks slow enemies by 30% for 1 second. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.

name: mars_spear
description: Mars throws his legendary Spear with deadly precision, damaging each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. If a skewered hero hits a tree, building, or cliff, they will be impaled to it and stunned.
lore: The legendary Spear of Mars still glows with the heat of the forge god's fires.
note:
Spear of Mars can hit invisible units and reveals them if they are stunned.
Spear of Mars will only pin a units to cliffs onto elevated areas, otherwise it will push them off onto lower ground.
shard_description: Spear of Mars impales up to two units and leaves a fire trail behind for 10 seconds. Deals 35 damage per second and slows by 20%. Debuff lingers for 2 seconds.

name: mars_arena_of_blood
description: After a short formation time, Mars summons an arena lined with the undead warriors of the Ash Legion, who block enemy attacks and movement. Enemy heroes near the inside edge of the arena will be attacked by spears, dealing damage and knocking them back.
lore: The long-dead members of the Ash Legion, assembled from the finest warriors to ever test the might of Mars, still revel in the thrill of combat, gladly beholden to the hand that fell them for as long as he so commands.

name: special_bonus_unique_clinkz_3
description: When using Searing Arrows, a second Searing Arrow targets a random enemy within the spell's range.

name: special_bonus_unique_invoker_4
description: Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a **90** second cooldown. Creates **2** visible Sun Strikes within **160**-**200** range of each enemy hero.

name: special_bonus_unique_kunkka_3
description: Spawns 3 Ghostships, **3.35** seconds apart, towards the target location.

name: special_bonus_unique_lone_druid_7
localized_name: +1000 True Form and Spirit Bear Health

name: special_bonus_unique_morphling_3
description: Additional enemy units within cast range are also targeted by Adaptive Strike.

name: special_bonus_unique_night_stalker_2
localized_name: +80 Hunter In The Night Attack Speed

name: special_bonus_unique_mars_arena_of_blood_hp_regen
localized_name: Arena Of Blood Grants Team +180 HP Regen

name: special_bonus_unique_antimage_5
description: After blinking, an uncontrollable illusion is created at Anti-Mage's original location.  Deals **-80%** less damage, takes **250%** damage, and lasts **10** seconds.

name: special_bonus_unique_medusa_4
description: Allows on-hit effects to apply to the secondary attacks from Split Shot.

name: special_bonus_unique_death_prophet_4
description: While Exorcism is active, Death Prophet moves at 550 movement speed and cannot be slowed.

name: special_bonus_unique_wisp_4
description: While tethered to a friendly Hero, each time that Hero attacks, Io will attack the same target automatically.

name: special_bonus_unique_axe_3
description: Your own attacks against enemy units also have a chance to trigger Counter Helix.

name: special_bonus_unique_bane_4
description: Bane gains attack speed equal to the attack speed stolen for the duration of Enfeeble.

name: special_bonus_unique_morphling_4
description: Enemies hit by Waveform are also instantly attacked by Morphling.

name: special_bonus_unique_puck_3
description: Puck instantly attacks all enemies while affected by Dream Coil, every **0.75** seconds.

name: special_bonus_unique_queen_of_pain_2
description: Enemies damaged by Scream of Pain are forced to run towards their fountain for **1.2** seconds.

name: special_bonus_unique_razor_4
localized_name: +180 Eye of the Storm Passive Damage

name: special_bonus_unique_riki_5
description: No actions take Riki out of invisibility, only revealed by sources of True Sight.

name: special_bonus_unique_storm_spirit_4
localized_name: 550 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning
description: Every **550** distance travelled in Ball Lightning creates a Static Remnant.

name: special_bonus_unique_sven_3
description: Applies a basic dispel on all enemies hit.

name: special_bonus_unique_wisp_5
description: While tethered to a friendly Hero, that Hero gains its Aghanim's Scepter ability upgrades for the duration.

name: tiny_toss_tree
description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
lore: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.

name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_4
description: Applies a basic dispel to Templar Assassin.

name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_5
description: Enemies hit by the spill of Psi Blades have their movement speed slowed by **100%** for **1** second.

name: special_bonus_unique_treant_3
description: Any tree that is destroyed on the map will respawn **2** seconds later.

name: special_bonus_unique_troll_warlord_4
description: Can be cast while stunned and applies a strong dispel to Troll Warlord.

name: special_bonus_unique_tusk_4
description: Walrus Punch gains a chance to be triggered on normal attacks, independent of mana cost or cooldown.

name: special_bonus_unique_oracle_4
description: The target of False Promise also becomes invisible for the duration (with a 0.6 second fade time).

name: special_bonus_unique_venomancer_5
description: The wards are based on the current level of Plague Ward and spawned within 100 range of the impacted Hero, on opposite sides.

name: special_bonus_unique_winter_wyvern_4
description: The slow is still applied for the same duration.

name: special_bonus_unique_techies_4
description: All mines, including Stasis Traps, can be ordered to move to a location once placed.

name: morphling_adaptive_strike_str
description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a **3** second cooldown.
lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
note: Projectile moves at **1150** speed.

name: special_bonus_unique_faceless_void_4
description: Grants a **20%** chance to avoid damage entirely.

name: special_bonus_unique_tiny_5
description: Toss can target the ground as well as enemy units.

name: special_bonus_unique_monkey_king_6
description: Creates an additional ring of **7** soldiers at **1100** range from the center.

name: special_bonus_unique_dark_seer_4
description: A second Wall of Replica is created **600** units behind the first wall.  Illusions are independent for each Wall.

name: special_bonus_unique_shadow_demon_6
localized_name: Soul Catcher Creates 2 Illusion On Death

name: special_bonus_unique_arc_warden_4
description: Affects visible units only.

name: visage_stone_form_self_cast
description: After a short delay, the nearest Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area.  The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly.  After **6** seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.
note: While Stone Form is not dispellable, the stun can be removed by strong dispells.

name: special_bonus_unique_huskar_5
description: Pierces Spell Immunity.

name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar
description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield.
lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk
description: Beastmaster sends an invisible Hawk to scout an area.
lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
shard_description: Reduces Hawk cooldown by 15 seconds. Hawks gains Dive Bomb. Channels for 1 second, revealing itself, and then flies towards the target enemy, dealing 250 damage and stunning them for 2 seconds, killing the hawk. Cast Range: 1200.

name: huskar_inner_fire
description: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.
lore: Not even Huskar's own flesh can contain the unending expansion of his life force.
shard_description: Causes Inner Fire to reduce healing and regeneration by 50% and applies a 40% movement speed slow. Lowers cooldown by 3 seconds. Can be cast while disabled.

name: spirit_breaker_bulldoze
description: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.
lore: Barathrum warps the fabric of reality around him, lessening its influence on his physical form.

name: dazzle_bad_juju
description: Passively reduces cooldowns on Dazzle's abilities and items. Anytime he casts a spell, all nearby enemies will have their armor reduced. Debuff stacks and refreshes duration.
lore: Each invocation of the Nothl realm helps it further permeate the surroundings of our own.

name: chen_divine_favor
description: Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration and amplifies all health restore by a percentage.
lore: Chen's zeal is infectious, blessing his allies with vitality and compelling them to his side.
shard_description: Allows Divine Favor to be cast on allies, teleporting them back home after **6** seconds. Cannot target Spell Immune Allies. Cast Range: 600

name: pangolier_lucky_shot
description: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to slow, apply a Disarm and reduce armor.
lore: The Pangolier's blade is guided more often by whim than reason.

name: lone_druid_spirit_bear_defender
description: Spirit Bear absorbs **30%** of the damage dealt to Lone Druid.

name: lone_druid_spirit_link
description: Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, increasing the attack speed of both and causing damage dealt by the Spirit Bear to heal Lone Druid.
lore: Sylla is emboldened by the presence of his companion, his vitality replenished with each swipe of the Spirit Bear's claws.

name: brewmaster_cinder_brew
description: Drenches an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignited once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by **3** seconds when ignited.
lore: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!

name: lich_dark_sorcery
description: Grants you bonus attack speed for a limited number of attacks, draining a percentage of mana for each hit. Costs a percentage of current health to cast. Lasts up to **15** seconds or when the attack count is consumed.

name: lich_frost_aura
description: Allied Aura. Causes all nearby ally attacks to slow enemy movement speed.

name: antimage_counterspell
description: Passively grants you magic resistance. Can be activated to create an anti-magic shell around you that sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead of affecting you.
lore: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.

name: keeper_of_the_light_will_o_wisp
description: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.
lore: Though he would not claim to 'know' them, Ezalor holds an uncanny influence over many powerful creatures always willing to come to his aid.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Will-O-Wisp.

name: meepo_ransack
description: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.
lore: So you gonna need that, or...?

name: clinkz_burning_army
description: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, use his current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range.
lore: Existing on the brink of life and death, Clinkz has learned to temporarily bridge the gap between the two.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Burning Army.

name: rubick_arcane_supremacy
description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane allows him to have a larger cast range and increased potency.
lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...

name: tusk_tag_team
description: Temporarily applies a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts **5** seconds.
lore: Even far from Cobalt, Tusk carries the 'Barrier Chill' in his very bones.
note: Affects attacks from allied heroes, Tusk or any of his units.

name: omniknight_pacify
description: Causes affected enemies to deal less spell damage for a duration.
lore: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.

name: lich_sinister_gaze
description: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana.
lore: Mind the cold...
scepter_description: Casts Sinister Gaze in a target area.

name: void_spirit_aether_remnant
description: Vector targeted. Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.
lore: Inai exists far beyond the scope of a single point in space and time.

name: void_spirit_astral_step
description: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for **1.25** seconds and then detonates.
lore: A small step for Inai creates great devastation on the mortal plane.
note: Astral Step attacks do not cleave.

name: void_spirit_resonant_pulse
description: Void Spirit wraps himself in a protective shield that absorbs physical damage and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The shield gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.
lore: Inai never hesitates to shroud himself in the essence of his true self when forced to interact with the mortal plane.
scepter_description: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain two charges.

name: special_bonus_unique_void_spirit_8
description: Attacks made with Astral Step deal a critical strike.

name: seasonal_throw_snowball
description: Throw a snowball at an ally or enemy.
lore: Hand crafted at the perfect temperature.

name: seasonal_summon_snowman
description: Construct a jolly snowman.
lore: He'll stay friends as long as he can.

name: seasonal_decorate_tree
description: Give any tree a delightfully seasonal touch.
lore: Festive trappings for even the bloodiest of battlefields.

name: seasonal_festive_firework
description: Shoot a firework into the air.
lore: There's nothing more festive than explosions!

name: frostivus2018_throw_snowball
description:
Throw a snowball at an enemy, damaging and stunning all enemy units around it.

Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
lore: Enjoy a bold, rocky center with a packed-ice crust!

name: frostivus2018_summon_snowman
description:
Summons a snowman that taunts nearby enemies.

Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
lore: He's irresistibly friendly!

name: frostivus2018_decorate_tree
description:
Decorate a tree with blinking lights that damage nearby enemies.

Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
lore: Who knew a few twinkling lights could be so deadly?

name: seasonal_summon_penguin
description: Summon a friendly penguin who slides around. Each time a hero bumps the penguin, it gains speed and lasts a bit longer.
lore: Nothing gets age-old enemies to set aside their differences quite like a penguin to play with.
note: Your team's penguins will pass through enemy heroes that you don't have vision of.

name: frostivus2018_festive_firework
description:
Fires a global range firework that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies, blinding them, and providing vision for 10 seconds.

Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
lore: There's nothing more festive than explosions!

name: seasonal_summon_ti9_balloon
description: No one can resist the sky snake's goofy charms.

name: seasonal_ti9_banner
description: Plant your personal battle standard to mark this battleground as yours!

name: seasonal_ti9_instruments
description: Lay down some savage beats.

name: seasonal_ti9_shovel
description: Dig around the map for buried treasure!

name: seasonal_ti9_monkey
description: He'll fling filth at your enemies so you don't have to.

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl10_l
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl15_l
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl20_l
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl25_l
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl10_r
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl15_r
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl20_r
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: ad_special_bonus_gold_lvl25_r
description: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

name: invoker_cold_snap_ad
description: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases as the level goes up.
lore: Sadron's Protracted Frisson.
note: The freeze stun only triggers on damage greater than **10** after reductions.

name: invoker_ghost_walk_ad
description: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies, and slows Invoker as well based on the level.
lore: Myrault's Hinder-Gast.
note: The slow effect does not work on Spell Immune enemies.

name: invoker_tornado_ad
description:
Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level and holds enemies in the air for a duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: Claws of Tornarus.
note: Units are invulnerable while affected by Tornado, and the damage is dealt when landing.

name: invoker_emp_ad
description: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after **2.9** seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.
lore: Endoleon's Malevolent Perturbation.
note: Will not affect cycloned units (Tornado or Eul's Scepter of Divinity).

name: invoker_alacrity_ad
description: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed and their damage.
lore: Gaster's Mandate of Impetuous Strife.

name: invoker_sun_strike_ad
description: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.
lore: Harlek's Incantation of Incineration.
note:
Gives vision of the target area before the strike.
Invoker gains experience with kills made from Sun Strike, even if made from outside of experience range.
scepter_description: Adds Cataclysm. Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a **90** second cooldown. Creates 2 visible Sun Strikes within **160**-**200** range of each enemy hero.

name: invoker_forge_spirit_ad
description: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes.
lore: Culween's Most Cunning Fabrications.
note: Casting this ability will replace currently summoned Forged Spirits.

name: invoker_chaos_meteor_ad
description: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage and rolling further based on the level. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time.
lore: Tarak's Descent of Fire.
note:
Deals main damage to enemy units under meteor every **0.5** seconds and burns enemies for smaller damage over **3** seconds.
The meteor moves at a speed of **300**.

name: invoker_ice_wall_ad
description: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies and deals damage each second.
lore: Killing Wall of Koryx.
note: The slow will still affect Spell Immune enemies if their spell immunity was created after being affected by Ice Wall.
shard_description: Allows Ice Wall to be a Vector Target ability with 900 cast range. Increases wall length by 320.

name: invoker_deafening_blast_ad
description: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration then disarm their attacks for a duration.
lore: Buluphont's Aureal Incapacitator.

name: tiny_tree_channel
description: Tiny channels this ability to throw random trees within range towards the targeted aoe. Deals Tiny's attack damage plus a bonus to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
lore: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Tree Volley.

name: spectre_haunt_single
description: Allows Spectre to perform a single target unit Haunt. Casts a Spectral Dagger on the target.
lore: With great focus of will, Mercurial can sometimes limit the extent of her division.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Shadow Step.

name: grimstroke_dark_portrait
description: Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero. Illusion is spell immune, and has bonus movement speed and attack damage.
lore: No dark creation is beyond the skill of the master's hand.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Dark Portrait.

name: templar_assassin_trap_teleport
description: Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after a brief channel. Does not break meld. Detonates the Psionic Trap on arrival.
lore: In reward for her service, Lanaya has been granted access to secrets that unlock new techniques for her psionic gifts.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Psionic Projection.

name: clinkz_scepter
scepter_description: Adds new ability: clinkz_scepter.

name: slardar_scepter
scepter_description: Adds new ability: slardar_scepter.

name: troll_warlord_scepter
scepter_description: Adds new ability: troll_warlord_scepter.

name: dawnbreaker_fire_wreath
description: Dawnbreaker whirls her hammer around 3 times, damaging enemies with her attack plus bonus damage. On the final strike, she smashes her hammer down, stunning and damaging enemies in front of her.
lore: Across the vast lineage of star progeny, there were multitudes unwilling to align with the aims of the Children of Light. To those who dared organize defiance, the Children would dispatch Valora and her hammer to show a measure of their power--to leave the rebels either shattered or set back to rights.
note:
Dawnbreaker travels at a rate of **215** for the duration of the ability and takes a brief **0.3**s to recover after the final strike.
Celestial Hammer or Solar Guardian cannot be cast during the combo.
Cleave does not work with this ability.
Can be self-cast to move forward

name: dawnbreaker_converge
description: Dawnbreaker recalls her hammer, pulling them together so they meet in the middle.

name: dawnbreaker_solar_guardian
description: Dawnbreaker creates a pulsing effect at a location within **350** units of an allied hero anywhere on the map, damaging enemies and healing allies with each pulse. After a short duration, she flies to the target location, dealing additional damage and stunning enemies upon landing. Once channeled, Dawnbreaker cannot stop the ability.
lore: Only in defense of an ally will Valora relent to call upon the last reserves of her old powers that still allow cosmic flight.

name: dawnbreaker_celestial_hammer
description: Dawnbreaker hurls her weapon at a target, damaging enemies struck along the way. The hammer pauses for **2** seconds at the destination before flying back to her, leaving a trail of fire that slows enemies. Dawnbreaker can recall the hammer at any time, pulling her towards it so they meet in the middle.
lore: The Brightmaul is Valora's oldest companion and sole remaining connection to the glow of her creators.
note:
The hammer damages enemies both when thrown and when returning to Dawnbreaker.
Dawnbreaker's movement distance is capped at the ability's cast range.

name: dawnbreaker_luminosity
description: After **3** attacks, Dawnbreaker powers up, charging her next attack with a critical hit that heals all allied heroes within **650** units around her for a portion of attack damage dealt. Creeps and neutral enemies provide less healing. Allies are healed for **35%** of the amount.
lore: Diminished in power without access to the Children's replenishing light, Valora can still recharge herself and her allies by creating order from the chaos which resides within each fight.

name: high_five
description: Throw your hand (or handy appendage) in the air!

name: grimstroke_dark_artistry
description: Grimstroke paints a path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits.
lore: The corruptive force of Grimstroke's ink, drawn from the reservoir of his fallen people, consumes any enemy caught in its path.

name: grimstroke_ink_creature
description:
Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.

Hero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.
lore: Grimstroke holds no sorrow for the downfall of his people. Only for Yaovhi, she who was most dear to him, does he feel even a semblance of longing.
note:
The phantom falls off if the target becomes invisible or spell immune.
The phantom will return if the target dies during the latch.

name: grimstroke_spirit_walk
description: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After **3** seconds it triggers, applying damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how long ink tendril was near any hero.
lore: Now that the rise of the ink tide no longer threatens to overwhelm Grimstroke, its tendrils of power are never far from his hand.
shard_description: Causes Ink Swell to deal 50% more damage and heal the target for 50% of the damage Ink Swell deals. Upon expiration, the target will receive a strong dispell.

name: special_bonus_unique_phantom_assassin_8
localized_name: +700 Range and Ground Target Stifling Dagger
description: Allows using Blink Strike on the Dagger. Grants 800 vision. Lasts up to 2 minutes.

name: pangolier_rollup
description: Pangolier curls into an immobile protective ball for up to 4 seconds, gaining magic immunity and allowing him to turn. Can be cast during Rolling Thunder to temporarily hit the brakes. Can cast Rolling Thunder and Shield Crash during Roll Up. If enemies attack Pangolier during this, he will roll away from the attacker for 0.75 seconds, applying Rolling Thunder damage/stun if there are enemies in the way. Cooldown: 30
shard_description: Adds new ability: Roll Up.

name: lich_ice_spire
description:
Creates an icicle at the target spot for **15** seconds, slowing enemies within **750** range by **-30%**. Has 800 health.

Chain Frost can bounce to the Icicle if there are no other enemies in range.

Can cast Frost Shield on it.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Ice Spire.

name: pangolier_rollup_stop
description: Ends Pangolier's Roll Up early.

name: faceless_void_time_walk_reverse
description: Replaces Time Walk with Reverse Time Walk for 1.5 seconds after landing. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Reverse Time Walk.

name: hoodwink_sharpshooter
description:
Hoodwink charges up and fires a deadly bolt from her crossbow, dealing heavy damage and slow to an enemy Hero.  The damage and debuff duration scale up to max after **3** seconds, and the bolt is fired automatically after **5** seconds.
Hoodwink is knocked backwards for a distance of **350** from the force of the shot.
lore: While her first arbalest was a chance discovery, Hoodwink now takes great care in carving and caring for her own -- of course with some necessary components pilfered or otherwise cleverly procured.

name: hoodwink_decoy
description: Hoodwink sends a decoy illusion to the target location.  When the illusion is attacked or hit by a targeted ability, it is destroyed and plants a tree in its place that applies a lesser Bushwhack to enemy heroes around it.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Decoy.

name: hoodwink_bushwhack
description: Tosses a net trap that stuns enemy heroes if they are near a tree in the area.  Affected enemies take damage and are pulled towards the tree nearest to them, and have their vision reduced to 0 for the duration of the stun.
lore: Hoodwink favors Ironwood groves for ambushes, but the wary step carefully in all areas of the mistwoods.
note: Units can be freed from the stun by destroying the tree.

name: hoodwink_sharpshooter_release
description: Release the charged up shot, regain ability to move and attack.
lore: Fire!

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK

name: necronomicon_archer_purge
description:
Removes positive buffs from enemies and slow their movement speed.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: dark_willow_terrorize
description: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.
lore: You think you know the first thing about fear? Jex'll show you what that word truly means...
note: Terrorize provides vision on affected units.

name: hoodwink_acorn_shot
description:
Fires Hoodwink's attack with an acorn at the target unit.  The acorn bounces to nearby targets, slowing them and dealing a percentage of Hoodwink's attack with bonus damage.
If point targeted, a tree is created at the target position and the acorn will bounce to nearby targets.  The ability may be placed on auto-cast to force this behavior.
lore: Though she'll make do with almost anything, Oak and Ironwood acorns make the most effective projectiles -- and the bulk of Hoodwink's stash.
note:
The same target can be hit more than once.
Bounces will seek units in the fog of war in a 525 radius, but not invisible units.
The planted tree lasts for 20 seconds.
Acorn Shot benefits from attack range bonuses.

name: hoodwink_scurry
description: Hoodwink passively has a chance to evade physical attacks while near trees.  When activated, Hoodwink gains bonus movement speed, phased collision, and tree-walking for a brief time.
lore: There's not a nook or cranny in the Wood Tomo'kan out of reach of Hoodwink's paws.

name: special_bonus_unique_hoodwink_camouflage
description: Hoodwink becomes invisible near trees after **1.2** seconds of not moving, attacking, or casting spells.

name: special_bonus_unique_hoodwink_sharpshooter_pure_damage
localized_name: Sharpshooter Pure Damage and Pierces Spell Immunity

name: hoodwink_hunters_boomerang
description: Tosses a boomerang at the target enemy in an arc. Upon contact, it returns to Hoodwink.  The boomerang will deal damage as it passes through or hits enemies, and apply a Hunter's Mark that causes affected enemies to be slowed and be more vulnerable to spell damage and have reduced status resistance.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Hunter's Boomerang.

name: roshan_halloween_wave_of_force
description: After a delay, Roshan smashes the ground, causing massive radial damage in an area around him, knocking back all enemies.  The closer to Roshan the enemy is, the more damage it takes.

name: roshan_halloween_toss
description: Roshan tosses a nearby enemy unit at an enemy that is further away.

name: roshan_halloween_shell
description: Roshan becomes immune to physical damage, but takes enhanced magical damage for a brief time.  When Roshan uses Shell, all ability and item cooldowns are refreshed.

name: roshan_halloween_apocalypse
description: Roshan launches devastating beams of incineration from the sky at all enemy heroes outside of 400 range, but within 1200 range.

name: roshan_halloween_burn
description: Roshan breathes a lethal arc of searing fire.
